(Hebrews 11:1.) Faith Is God's Gift.--Faith earns nothing for us; it is the gift of God, which we may receive and cherish by making Christ our personal Saviour. We may refuse the gift, and talk doubts, and become unhappy by cherishing unbelief. But this will grow into an impassable barrier, shutting us away from the Spirit of God 
                                                                           1081
and closing our hearts to His light and His love (ST May 19, 1898).
